SELECT t_notice.* FROM t_notice WHERE 1=1
AND t_notice.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{type},'%')
AND t_notice.enable = #{enable})
AND t_notice.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND t_notice.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
AND t_notice.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{createTime},'%')
AND t_notice.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{updateTime},'%')
AND t_notice.end_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{endTime},'%')
AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP > t_notice.end_time
AND t_notice.end_time >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
